title: System Maintenance Scheduled
content: The system will undergo scheduled maintenance on February 1, 2026 from 2:00 AM to 5:00 AM. The system will be temporarily unavailable during this period. Please plan your work accordingly and save all data before the maintenance window.

title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Typhoon Signal No.8 Alert
content: Typhoon Signal No.8 will be hoisted in approximately 1 hour. All field operations should be suspended immediately. Personnel are advised to secure equipment and return to safe locations. Remote monitoring will remain active.

title: üî¥ CRITICAL: Power Grid Instability Detected
content: Critical power quality issue detected in Central District. Engineers are investigating. Real-time monitoring is active. Emergency response team has been dispatched. Expected resolution time: 3 hours.
